DOC.brief_summary: Effect of Non Invasive Ventilation on end-expiratory lung volumes determined by electrical impedance tomography
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Non Invasive Ventilation on Lung Volumes Determined by Electrical Impedance Tomography
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective clinical study in ICU with patients requiring non invasive ventilation (NIV) comparing lung volumes determined by electrical impedance tomography before, during and after NIV. Duration of NIV is 30 minutes.
DOC.criteria: Adult ICU patients requiring non invasive ventilation Consent of patients or family Arterial line Tracheotomized patients Dressings in the thoracic area
